DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to report outcomes,including grade â‰¥2 overall late rectal and urinary toxicity and biochemical control rates in patients treated with IMRT (70 gy, 74 Gy and 80 Gy)
DOC.brief_title: Intensity-modulated Radiation Therapy From 70Gy to 80Gy in Localized Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Consecutive patients from June 2000 to December 2010 with untreated histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate stage T1cT4 N0 M0 according to the 1992 American Joint Committee on Cancer staging system Patients with positive pelvic lymphadenectomy or radiological positives nodes
